name: RiskAdjustmentSuspectTypeCodeSystem
title: Risk Adjustment Suspect Type Code System
description:
(The Da Vinci Risk Adjustment Implementation Guide is under development). This is a code system for Risk Adjustment suspect type to indicate whether it is a suspected Condition Category (CC) gap,
  a historic CC gap, or an unsuspected CC. Historic, suspected, and net-new are mutually exclusive.

concept.definition: Historic Condition Category (CC) Gap. Historic CC is based on data from a prior clinical evaluation period.
Suspected Condition Category (CC) Gap. A member never has CC before, but when a Server runs a suspecting algorithm, suspected CCs are identified for the member.

Net-New Condition Category (CC). New Condition Category, not from suspected process or historic. A Net-New CC is documented for the first time during the clinical evaluation period for the
      risk adjustment model. Any CCs that are net new must be either closed-gap or pending, and can not be open-gap.
